caption: While in line at the United Church of Christ soup kitchen, <PERSON> passes <PERSON> a bag full of her prescription medications. Before being homeless, <PERSON> suffered from a host of ailments that have only gotten worse, and now she needs both knees replaced. ``I'm living on painkillers,'' she says.
exif: {"Image ImageDescription": "Images on a story about the aging of the nation's homeless population. Focus on Baltimore through Healthcare of the Homeless we followed a couple Tony and Andrea and Tony Simmons, homeless himself, he advocates for the homeless population.Images on a story about the aging of the nation's homeless population. Focus on Baltimore through Healthcare of the Homeless we followed a couple Tony and Andrea and Tony Simmons, homeless himself, he advocates for the homeless population.More than half of the nation's single homeless adults are age 47 and over, bringing new challenges for communities around the country and for the homeless themselves.  In the second part of our two-part series, we focus on one couple living in a tent below interstate 83 in Baltimore, Maryland.  They have to deal with multijple health and social problems that have only been worsened by living outside.
